name: RIFT (itch) (gregorski)
description:
A ghost hunter explores an abandoned facility in hopes of catching invaluable video evidence with their camcorder. Soon after entry, strange phenomena begin to occur and the facility is in lockdown. You’ll need to find a way to escape, or forever suffer the cycle.

Download the .zip, extract it, then run RIFT.exe to play the game. Enjoy :)

While in game, use P or Escape to access help and controls. SHIFT + ESC to quit.

Thanks for playing! - the gamebois
